scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run copy:frontend
scripts.copy:frontend: mkdir -p backend/dist/frontend && cp -r frontend/.next/standalone/* frontend/.next/static backend/dist/frontend/ 2>/dev/null || cp -r frontend/out/* backend/dist/frontend/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Frontend copy failed, trying alternative...' && mkdir -p backend/dist/public && cp -r frontend/out/* backend/dist/public/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
